text: Chances Are is a 1989 American romantic comedy fantasy movie. This movie is about happenings in 1964 and 1987. It is also about reincarnation. Cybill Shepherd plays Corinne Jeffries. Mary Stuart Masterson plays Miranda Jeffries. ==Cast== * Cybill Shepherd as Corinne Jeffries * Robert Downey, Jr. as Alex Finch * Ryan O'Neal as Phillip Train * Mary Stuart Masterson as Miranda Jeffries * Christopher McDonald as Louie Jeffries * Josef Sommer as Judge Fenwick * Joe Grifasi as Omar * Henderson Forsythe as Ben Bradlee * Fran Ryan as Mavis Talmadge * James Noble as Dr. Bailey ==Locations== Several scenes were filmed in Georgetown, along the mall and other parts of Washington, D.C.. ==Reception== Chances Are received positive reviews from movie critics. Rotten Tomatoes gives the movie a 64% rating. The movie got back over $16 million. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1989 fantasy movies Category:1989 romantic comedy movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies about reincarnation Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies directed by Emile Ardolino
title: Chances Are
